user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send a thoughtful response to me (oakwoodteachers@school.com) regarding the accommodations for our students, and remind her to check her Gmail and Jane'"'"'s Care Log for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Updated Student Accommodations Information

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send a thoughtful response to oakwoodteachers@school.com regarding the current medical and learning accommodations for our students? When you have a moment, please double-check both your Gmail and your Care Log for the latest information before replying.

Thank you so much for your continued collaboration!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
Oakwood Teaching Alliance

final_output:

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
Oakwood Teaching Alliance
